amendment.description: Amendment clarifies that nothing in this bill authorizes the government to target a US person for surveillance.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in House Report 113-41 to make clear that nothing in this bill authorizes the government to target a US person for surveillance.

vote.text: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 0 (Roll no. 114).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the LaMalfa amendment (A007) Agreed to by recorded vote: 413 - 0 (Roll no. 114).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. LaMalfa.
